name: FranklinCovey
description:
We transform organizations by building exceptional leaders, teams, and cultures that get results. When organizations partner with us, their people change behavior—both individually and collectively—in ways that have a dramatic impact.

Our content, based on timeless principles of human effectiveness, is designed to help people change both their mindsets and their behavior. It is combined with a team of experts, a dynamic behavior change platform, and key metrics that deliver exceptional results again and again.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: We Enable Greatness In People And Organizations Everywhere
ShortDescription: We transform organizations by building exceptional leaders, teams, and cultures that get results.

Highlights.name: Leadership Development for Success
Highlights.description: FranklinCovey is a leadership training company that offers courses, services, and technology to help businesses develop their leaders and improve their culture.

Highlights.name: Empowering Leaders
Highlights.description: Some of the specific services they offer include coaching, consulting, and access to an online platform.

Highlights.name: Driving Results
Highlights.description: FranklinCovey helps clients achieve results such as improved employee engagement, increased productivity, and stronger customer relationships.

enhanced_description: FranklinCovey is a global leadership training and development company that transforms organizations by building exceptional leaders, teams, and cultures to achieve dramatic results. Their offerings encompass courses, services, and technology, including access to a dynamic online platform. The content is based on timeless principles of human effectiveness, combined with a team of experts and key metrics to deliver results. FranklinCovey focuses on accelerating skill development and learning efficiency, enabling behavior change, both individually and collectively. Their services specifically include coaching, consulting, and an online platform designed to help businesses develop leaders, improve culture, engage employees, and ultimately achieve outcomes such as improved employee engagement, increased productivity, and stronger customer relationships.
key_use_cases: Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency
competitive_advantages: Content based on timeless principles of human effectiveness
Combination of expert teams, dynamic behavior change platform, and key metrics
Comprehensive offering of courses, services (coaching, consulting), and technology (online platform)
Focus on achieving measurable results like improved employee engagement, increased productivity, and stronger customer relationships
implementation_scenarios: Blended learning (combining online platform access with coaching and consulting services)
